subject: May I Have Your Attention, Ple
body:
May I Have Your Attention, Please?
With due respect it's my great pleasure to inform you that United Nations
Board of Directors had agreed to compensate you with USD 7.8 Million United
State Dollars and your payments has been arranged through MasterCard ATM
which is the latest instruction from Ms.Kristalina Georgieva the Imf
Director and the President of the World Bank Group David Malpass.
Therefore contact Mrs.patricia mahoney the UN Special Representative
who is in position to settle your payments.
Name:Mrs.patricia mahoney
Contact E-mail: (
mrspatriciamahoney02@gmail.com
)
Kindly forward the below details to her:
1. Full Name:
2. Residence Address
3. Telephone:.....
4. Age......
5. Sex........
6. Occupation.....
 This payments involves scam victims and International business that failed
due to government problems etc and bear it in mind that any other contact
you made outside; Mrs.patricia mahoney office is at your own risk. 
Please
make sure you indicate the UN approval code **RR4-ATM/UN** when contacting
her.
 Yours Sincerely
Ms.Nikki Nimrata Haley

subject: Re: May I Have Your Attention, Ple
body:
Dear Nimrata Haley,

Thank you for reaching out to me with this information. I appreciate your efforts in informing me about the compensation from the United Nations Board of Directors. It sounds like a great opportunity.

I would like to know more about how this compensation works. Could you please provide me with some additional details? How exactly does the ATM payment method function? And what is the role of Georgieva, the IMF Director, and David Malpass, the President of the World Bank Group, in this process?

Also, I'm curious to learn more about mahoney, the UN Special you mentioned. What is their role in settling these payments? How can I get in touch with them?

Lastly, could you please explain further about the types of individuals or businesses that are eligible for this compensation? You mentioned scam victims and businesses affected by government problems. Are there any specific criteria or requirements that need to be met?

Thank you once again for sharing this information with me. I look forward to hearing back from you soon.

Best wishes,
Lori
